src:
Siapkan Duit! Ini Jadwal Harbolnas 2019
07 Nov 2019, 05:51 by Vadhia Lidyana


Ilustrasi Harbolnas/Foto: Reuters

Jakarta - Hari Belanja Online Nasional (Harbolnas) ke-9 2019 akan digelar 11-12 Desember 2019. Seperti tahun-tahun sebelumnya, diskon yang diberikan pun cukup menggiurkan, yaitu sampai 90%."Sama seperti tahun sebelumnya, Harblnas ke-9 ini kita adakan di tanggal 11-12 Desember 2019," ujar Ketua Umum Asosiasi E-commerce Indonesia (idEA), Ignatius Untung, di The Fools Cafe & Resto, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Pria yang kerap disapa Untung tersebut mengatakan, meski diskon diatur oleh masing-masing platform peserta Harbolnas, namun mengikuti tahun lalu diskonnya minimal 35%."Kita mengembalikan pada platform masing-masing. Tapi melihat tahun lalu, minimal diskon 35%. Biar pun kita tidak ada secara spesifik harus berapa," terang Untung.Di Harbolnas 2019 ini, nantinya pada 11 Desember 2019 dikhususkan untuk diskon produk-produk lokal. Tak hanya label produk lokal, namun produk hasil bumi Indonesia seperti produk pertanian dan perikanan juga akan ikut diskon di Harbolnas ini."Tahun ini kita menyisipkan satu hari, 11 Desember 2019 untuk produk lokal saja dan hasil bumi lokal," imbuh dia.Adapun platform yang akan digaet dalam Harbolnas ini ditargetkan sebanyak 300 platform yang menjajakan produk kecantikan, fesyen, otomotif, kesehatan, kebutuhan rumah tangga, elektronik, gadget, dan sebagainyaSejauh ini, platform yang sudah terdaftar dalam Harbolnas 2019 di antaranya Lazada, iLotte.com, Elevania, Zalora, BukaLapak, MAP e-mall, dan sebagainya.Simak Video "Wuiw! Partisipasi Masyarakat di Harbolnas Tahun Ini Naik 46%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hns/hns)
text:
Prepare money! This is the 2019 Harbolnas Schedule
07 Nov 2019, 05:51 by Vadhia Lidyana


Illustration of Harbolnas / Photo: Reuters

Jakarta - 2019 National Online Shopping Day (Harbolnas) will be held 11-12 December 2019. As in previous years, the discounts given are quite tempting, which is up to 90%. "Same as the previous year, this 9th Harblnas we held on 11-12 December 2019, "said Chairman of the Indonesian E-commerce Association (idEA), Ignatius Untung, at The Fools Cafe & Resto, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). The man who is often called Lucky said, although the discount is regulated by each Harbolnas participant platform, but following last year the discount was at least 35%. "We return to each platform. But looking at last year, a minimum discount of 35%. Even though we don't have specifics, what should we do? , "explained Untung. In this 2019 Harbolnas, later on December 11, 2019 was devoted to discounts on local products. Not only local product labels, but Indonesian agricultural products such as agricultural products and fisheries will also be discounted at Harbolnas. "This year we will insert one day, December 11, 2019 for local products and local agricultural products," he added. which will be targeted at Harbolnas is targeted at 300 platforms that peddle beauty products, fashion, automotive, health, household needs, electronics, gadgets, etc. So far, platforms that have been registered in Harbolnas 2019 include Lazada, iLotte.com, Elevania, Zalora, BukaLapak, MAP e-mall, and so on. Watch Video "Wuiw! Community Participation in Harbolnas This Year Up 46%" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (hns / hns)
